actions.command: execute if entity @s[tag=Death_Timer_Start] run say killed

execute if entity @s[tag=Death_Timer_Start] at @e[tag=Living_Placeholder] if score @s Minion_Count = @e[tag=Living_Placeholder,limit=1,distance=..0.1] Minion_Count if score @s UUID0 = @e[tag=Living_Placeholder,limit=1,distance=..0.1] UUID0 if score @s UUID1 = @e[tag=Living_Placeholder,limit=1,distance=..0.1] UUID1 run kill @e[tag=Petrified_Heart,distance=..1,sort=nearest,limit=1]
